name: The Point of No Return (Asher-Robertson)
description:
THE POINT OF NO RETURN

Description: The Point of No Return is a short interactive experience that displays use of diegetic UI and game feel principles to simulate the feeling of being inside a spaceship's cockpit. Interact with futuristic controls, initiate a launch sequence, and encounter one of Space's great anomalies in this atmospheric simulation.

Background: The goal of this project was to demonstrate UI and game-feel design, specifically focusing on layered visual and audio feedback for each interaction. Initially, this was split into three separate elements (Main Menu, HUD, and Kinesthetic Flow) but is now showcased in a single, flowing interactive experience. This project was designed and developed solely by Asher Robertson over the course of 4 months during his Junior year at DigiPen Institute of Technology.
